pages.text: The tier system describes how many additional devices, including $(l:rituals/standing_stones)standing stones, ritual pillars$() or others, are required to complete it.$(br2)$(info) All rituals of tier 1 or higher feature a multiblock layout which can be visualised to make setup easier.$(br2)$(l:rituals/catalyst_plates)Catalyst plates$() are not considered when calculating a ritual's tier.

pages.title: Simple Rituals
pages.text: These rituals require no additional components to function properly and are thus considered 'tier 0'.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_flower_growth)Flower Growth$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_frost_lands)Frost Lands$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_gathering)Gathering$()

pages.title: Tier I
pages.text: These rituals require a single additional component to function.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_divine_protection)Divine Protection$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_germination)Germination$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_grove_supplication)Grove Supplication$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_healing_aura)Healing Aura$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_overgrowth)Overgrowth$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_summon_creatures)Summon Creatures$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_transmutation)Transmutation$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_wildroot_growth)Wildroot Growth$()

pages.title: Tier II
pages.text: These rituals require two additional components to function.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_heavy_storms)Heavy Storms$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_purity)Purity$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_windwall)Windwall$()

pages.title: Tier III
pages.text: These rituals require three additional components to function.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_animal_harvest)Animal Harvest$()

pages.title: Tier IV
pages.text: The most complex rituals, these require four additional components in order to function.$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_fire_storm)Fire Storm$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_spreading_forest)Spreading Forest$()$(li)$(l:rituals/ritual_warding_protection)Warding Protection$()
